author: barnabasbusa
content:
I saw a lot of interest in having quicker finality and that’s why people argue that they need shorter slot time, however shouldn’t it be easier to just have 16/8 slot per epochs and achieve the same thing?

I feel like changing the number of slots per epoch should be a significantly easier change than changing slot time, while still achieving faster finalization.

author: greystroke
content: Faster finalization is only one desirable property of shorter slot times that users desire.  The others are MEV mitigation, faster tx confirmations and improved L2 intraop.  It also the change that would most clearly demonstrate the L1 is scaling.
